citations.narrative:
The middle divider has areas of rust that animals can contact. The licensee has repaired some areas and has the material
to repair the rest. Areas of rust can become rough/sharp and can no longer be sanitized well. Ensure to make repairs to
the remaining dividers that have areas of rust that the animals can contact.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.28(a)(1)  Repeat
   
Primary enclosures. 
The middle divider has areas of rust that animals can contact. The licensee has repaired some areas and has the material 
to repair the rest. Areas of rust can become rough/sharp and can no longer be sanitized well. Ensure to make repairs to 
the remaining dividers that have areas of rust that the animals can contact. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
